title: What Is A Diet or Weight Loss Coach
itunes:title: What Is A Diet or Weight Loss Coach
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

If Michael Jordon had a coach and trainer throughout his career...guess what? We probably need someone in our corner to call us on our own excuses.

This episode discusses what a weightloss coach does and how to get over yourself that you might need more help than you think! I also help you see how to set up a coaching relationship on the FREE. If you listen to this podcast then you DO have a coach. It's ME! And I will teach you how to best use this podcast to get your weight off.
